                           boolean isLeadingConnection)

        socketChannel - used for sending and receiving PDUs
        isLeadingConnection - true if and only if this connection is the first connection associated with its enclosing session

      • receivePdu

        public org.jscsi.parser.ProtocolDataUnit receivePdu()
                                             throws DigestException,
                                                    org.jscsi.exception.InternetSCSIException,
                                                    IOException,
                                                    SettingsException
        Returns the next ProtocolDataUnit to be received on the connection.

        The method will block until a PDU has been completely received.

        Specified by:
        receivePdu in interface Connection
        Returns:
        the next received PDU
        Throws:
        DigestException - if a digest error has occured
        org.jscsi.exception.InternetSCSIException - if a general iSCSI protocol error has been detected
        IOException - if the connection was closed
        SettingsException - will not happen

      • sendPdu

             throws InterruptedException,
                    IOException,
                    org.jscsi.exception.InternetSCSIException

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        pdu - the PDU to send
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        IOException
        org.jscsi.exception.InternetSCSIException

      • call

        public Void call()
        Starts the processing of PDUs by this connection.

        For this method to work properly, the leading PDU send by the initiator over this connection must have been received via receivePdu().

        Specified by:
        call in interface Callable<Void>

      • getTargetSession

        public TargetSession getTargetSession()
        Specified by:
        getTargetSession in interface Connection

      • isLeadingConnection

        public boolean isLeadingConnection()
        Returns true if this is the leading connection, i.e. the first TargetConnection in the connection's TargetSession. Otherwise false is returned.
        Specified by:
        isLeadingConnection in interface Connection
        Returns:
        true if this is the leading connection

      • initializeConnectionSettingsNegotiator

        public void initializeConnectionSettingsNegotiator(SessionSettingsNegotiator sessionSettingsNegotiator)
        Initializes connectionSettingsNegotiator.

        This method must be be called after the this connection has been added to its session.

        Specified by:
        initializeConnectionSettingsNegotiator in interface Connection
